about.title: About me
about.text:
I realized I wanted to be a programmer at the age of 12, and I think this is a lifelong passion! With burning eyes, I gaze at Python back-end, but I'm also always ready to engage in something relate or learn something new, because deep inside I feel like a true engineer!

I'd be happy about any acquaintances!
